recipesJson.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: Thadentman
recipesJson.description: A very creamy strawberry cheesecake. Shake and vape but 2 weeks is incredible. Fw natural strawberry can be subbed for flv or whatever you want but flv is similar. I know the % looks strong but it's worth giving a shot

reviews.text: I'll start by saying I subbed out FW Strawberry with FLV at the same pecentage. As a person who has a hard time tasting strawberry, I quickly learned that this wasn't just another strawberry recipe. This is the best cheesecake base I've ever tried! Pound Cake, Pie Crust and Nut mix all do a glorious job of making an authentic rich, buttery crust. The 2 cheesecakes with the addition of the Catalan Cream and Bavarian Cream, makes this such a rich, creamy and smooth vape.  I was a little skeptical of the amount of flavors but everything is so well balanced. I really can't say enough about it. Love it! Great job Thadentman!
